questions.question: What is the predominant color of the rug's main body?
What is the apparent material composition of the rug?
Describe the texture of the rug's visible surface?
What color is the binding or edging along the rug's perimeter?
What appears to be the material of the rug's edging?
What is the overall shape of the displayed rug portion?
Is there any noticeable pattern or design on the rug's surface?
Does the rug appear to have a high or low pile height?
What is the visible thickness of the rug's edge binding?
Considering the edge, does this rug appear machine-made or handmade?
Does the rug show any visible signs of wear or damage?

Does the rug feature any additional details beyond its main body?
What is the apparent density of fibers making up the main rug?
